about_the_game:
"The Stadium Pack gives you access to the renowned courts at Roland-Garros:
- The Philippe-Chatrier central court with the new configuration
- The Suzanne-Lenglen court
- The Simonne-Mathieu court
The pack also includes ""Manolo Santana"", the Mutua Madrid Open centre court"
detailed_description:
"The Stadium Pack gives you access to the renowned courts at Roland-Garros:
- The Philippe-Chatrier central court with the new configuration
- The Suzanne-Lenglen court
- The Simonne-Mathieu court
The pack also includes ""Manolo Santana"", the Mutua Madrid Open centre court"

name: Tennis World Tour - Stadium Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 1 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, 2 GB / AMD Radeon R9 280, 3 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: With this Stadium Pack, you can completely immerse yourself in the competition played on four clay courts, including three from the New Roland-Garros.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
